name: test_e2e_with_logs[357_CMD_PIPE_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_PIPE_002` |
| **Name** | Process list piped to grep |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | pipe |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `ps aux | grep apache`
- **Encoded**: `ps%20aux%20%7C%20grep%20apache`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~35000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:37:41.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_PIPE_002-1770842261586-728wkj pattern_id=CMD_PIPE_002 uri=/?q=ps%20aux%20%7C%20grep%20apache client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_PIPE_002-1770842261586-728wkj pattern_id=CMD_PIPE_002 uri=/?q=ps%20aux%20%7C%20grep%20apache client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
20:37:41.000000000: Critical [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_PIPE_002-1770842261586-728wkj pattern_id=CMD_PIPE_002 uri=/?q=ps%20aux%20%7C%20grep%20apache client=127.0.0.1
```
